resources.string: To complete the registration process, you will need your teacher, parent, or guardian\'s assistance.
Please ask your teacher for assistance
The main control box is not connected. Please turn on Bluetooth and try again.
The number of %s do not match this model. Please check your robot and try again.
Please turn on Bluetooth in system settings.
The device is currently in charging protection. You can turn off charging protection by going to menu settings.
Your account has expired and your project files have been saved locally.

UBTECH Education, a division of UBTECH Robotics Corp., (hereinafter referred to as \"uKit EDU\" or \"We\") respects your privacy rights. This privacy notice explains who We are, how We collect, share and use your personal information, and how you exercise your privacy rights. This privacy notice applies to the personal information We collect through our product—the UKIT Educational products —and our services, which include mobile applications (\"Apps\"). The UKIT Educational products and services and Apps are referred to collectively in this Privacy Policy as the \"Services\".

Please read the following carefully. By clicking \"I accept\" or \"I agree\" or using the services you are entering into a binding contract with UBTECH Education, a division of Ubtech Robotics Corp., and its affiliates. (collectively, \"uKit EDU\", \"we\" or \"us\")
